These people have not got cinnamon or Arabia Ff‘lfss casia, and nevertheless Arabia is styled ‘ Happy' [Τιιεέῖἕῖιω —a country with a false and ungrateful appellation, annned. as she puts her happiness to the credit of the powers above, although she owes more of it to the power belowJ’ Her good fortune has been caused by the luxury of mankind even in the hour of death, when they burn over the departed the products which they had originally understood to have been created for the gods. Good authorities declare that Arabia does not produce so large a quantity of perfume in a year's output as was burned by the Emperor Nero in a day at the obsequies of his consort Poppaea. Then reckon up the vast number of funerals celebrated yearly throughout the entire world, and the perfumes such as are given to the gods a grain at a time, that are piled up in heaps to the honour of dead bodies!
